```{r run simulation}
source('fix_kappa_run.R')
```

```{r split results}
# load(file='RData/MSEs_fix_kappa.1.RData') 

MSEs %>% length
MSEs.framed.fix.kappa <- frameMSEs_fixKappa(MSEs.fix.kappa, configurations.fix.kappa)

ols.ind <- sapply(MSEs.framed.fix.kappa$model, function(x) identical(x, my.ols)) 
ridge.ind <- sapply(MSEs.framed.fix.kappa$model, function(x) identical(x, my.ridge))
nls.ind <- sapply(MSEs.framed.fix.kappa$model, function(x) identical(x, my.log.link)) 
logistic.ind <- sapply(MSEs.framed.fix.kappa$model, function(x) identical(x, my.logistic)) 


MSEs.framed.00 <- MSEs.framed.fix.kappa[ols.ind,]
MSEs.framed.10 <- MSEs.framed.fix.kappa[ridge.ind,]
MSEs.framed.30 <- MSEs.framed.fix.kappa[nls.ind,]
MSEs.framed.40 <- MSEs.framed.fix.kappa[logistic.ind,]
```


```{r all_plots}
.ylim <- c(0.5,3)
.jitter <- 100
plot.00 <- plotMSEs_fixKappa(MSEs.framed.00, '(a) OLS', legend.position='none', y.lim=.ylim, jitter=.jitter)
plot.10 <- plotMSEs_fixKappa(MSEs.framed.10, '(b) Ridge', legend.position='none', y.lim=.ylim, jitter=.jitter)
plot.30 <- plotMSEs_fixKappa(MSEs.framed.30, '(c) Non-Linear Least Squares', legend.position='none', y.lim=.ylim, jitter=.jitter)
plot.40 <- plotMSEs_fixKappa(MSEs.framed.40, '(d) Logistic Regression', legend.position='none', y.lim=.ylim, jitter=.jitter)

grid.arrange(plot.00, plot.10, plot.30, plot.40, ncol=2)
```


```{r export plot}
directory <- "~/workspace/ParalSimulate/output/"
the.file <-paste(directory, "highdim_asymptotics_1.pdf", sep='')
pdf(file=the.file, onefile = FALSE, paper = "special", width=8, height=8)
grid.arrange(plot.00, plot.10, plot.30, plot.40, ncol=2)
dev.off()
```
